This is an important step as we are preparing to roll out our new "Batches" feature.
Why is this your final redemption?
We’re updating how you manage your donations by transitioning from redeems to a more efficient, organized system called “Batches.” This new method will make tracking your donations and reconciling your account even more effortless.
What's Next?
Your final redeem will set your account balance to zero.
You will find details of this final redeem in your account under the Batch tab, labeled as "Final Redeem".
All donations you’ve received with Matbia until now will appear under this final redeem.
